About Me

Hello! I'm Abdulbosit, a passionate web developer and IT instructor with over 3 years of programming experience. I specialize in modern web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JavaScript, React, Python, and Django. I'm dedicated to creating exceptional digital experiences and sharing knowledge with the next generation of developers.

2021-2022

CODDY

IT-instructor

Led comprehensive IT education programs for young learners, focusing on computer literacy, web development fundamentals, and programming concepts. Developed engaging curricula that made complex technical concepts accessible to students of all skill levels.

2020-2021

Freelance Developer

Web Development

Delivered custom web solutions for various clients, specializing in responsive design, modern JavaScript frameworks, and performance optimization. Built scalable applications using React, Django, and modern development practices.

2019-2020

Self-Taught Journey

Continuous Learning

Embarked on an intensive self-learning journey, mastering web development fundamentals through online courses, documentation, and hands-on projects. Built a strong foundation in programming principles and modern development workflows.
